Package com.telenav.kivakit.service.registry.server.rest

Class ServiceRegistryRestResource

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.component.Component, com.telenav.kivakit.configuration.lookup.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.configuration.settings.SettingsTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.paths.PackagePathTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.traits.LanguageTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.traits.TryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.resource.ResourceTrait
@Path("api/1.1.0") public class ServiceRegistryRestResource extends BaseRestResource
The ServiceRegistryServer REST resource. provides methods to register, renew and discover services. And to propagate registration information from local hosts to the network registry. Provides OpenAPI metadata to allow for automatic documentation via Swagger.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Constructor Details

    • ServiceRegistryRestResource

      public ServiceRegistryRestResource()

  • Method Details

    • onDiscoverApplications

      @POST @Path("discover-applications") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public DiscoverApplicationsResponse onDiscoverApplications​(DiscoverApplicationsRequest request)
      Locates the set of applications within the given scope.
      Returns:
      The set of applications that were discovered

    • onDiscoverPortService

      @POST @Path("discover-port-service") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public DiscoverPortServiceResponse onDiscoverPortService​(DiscoverPortServiceRequest request)
      Locates any service that may be running on the provided port. There is no scope for this request because a port is globally unique since it contains a host and port number and only one service can run on a port.
      Returns:
      The service running on the given port or null if the port is not bound to a service

    • onDiscoverServices

      @POST @Path("discover-services") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public DiscoverServicesResponse onDiscoverServices​(DiscoverServicesRequest request)
      Locates all the services within the given scope using criteria in the DiscoverServicesRequest object.
      Returns:
      The set of services that were discovered

    • onNetworkRegistryUpdate

      @POST @Path("network-registry-update") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public NetworkRegistryUpdateResponse onNetworkRegistryUpdate​(NetworkRegistryUpdateRequest request)
      Not public API

      On a NetworkServiceRegistry (only), this method is called by LocalServiceRegistry instances on different hosts on the network to update service registration information.

    • onRegisterService

      @POST @Path("register-service") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public RegisterServiceResponse onRegisterService​(RegisterServiceRequest request)
      Called to register a service on the local host. The resulting registration information will be propagated to any network registry by issuing a NetworkRegistryUpdateRequest.
      Parameters:
      request - The service to register
      Returns:
      The new service entry in the registry, specifying the port that can be used for the service

    • onRenewService

      @POST @Path("renew-service") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public RenewServiceResponse onRenewService​(RenewServiceRequest request)
      Not public API

      Called to renew the lease on a service on the local machine. The resulting renewal information will be propagated to any network registry by issuing a NetworkRegistryUpdateRequest.

      Parameters:
      request - The service to renew
      Returns:
      The renewed service with an updated Service.renewedAt() time.

    • onVersion

      @GET @Path("version") @Produces("text/plain") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response onVersion()
      Returns:
      The version of this KivaKit service registry
